code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ScrollProgress=()=>{const[scrollProgress,setScrollProgress]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const updateScrollProgress=()=>{const scrollTop=window.scrollY;const docHeight=document.documentElement.scrollHeight-window.innerHeight;const progress=scrollTop/docHeight*100;setScrollProgress(progress);};window.addEventListener('scroll',updateScrollProgress);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',updateScrollProgress);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed top-0 left-0 w-full h-1 bg-gray-200 dark:bg-dark-700 z-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"h-full bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-accent-600",style:{width:`${scrollProgress}%`},initial:{width:0},animate:{width:`${scrollProgress}%`},transition:{duration:0.1}})});};export default ScrollProgress;
